stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2 credits to bypass it. Use this ability only once per turn and only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1 credit: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

title: Afterimage
